```scss
// Property: mediaTypesRequiringUserActionForPlayback
// Description: Determines which media types require a user gesture to begin playing.
// Component(s): Ti.UI.iOS.WebViewConfiguration
'.media-types-requiring-user-action-for-playback-audiovisual-type-none': { mediaTypesRequiringUserActionForPlayback: Ti.UI.iOS.AUDIOVISUAL_MEDIA_TYPE_NONE }
'.media-types-requiring-user-action-for-playback-audiovisual-type-audio': { mediaTypesRequiringUserActionForPlayback: Ti.UI.iOS.AUDIOVISUAL_MEDIA_TYPE_AUDIO }
'.media-types-requiring-user-action-for-playback-audiovisual-type-video': { mediaTypesRequiringUserActionForPlayback: Ti.UI.iOS.AUDIOVISUAL_MEDIA_TYPE_VIDEO }
'.media-types-requiring-user-action-for-playback-audiovisual-type-all': { mediaTypesRequiringUserActionForPlayback: Ti.UI.iOS.AUDIOVISUAL_MEDIA_TYPE_ALL }
```
